scripts.dist: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if (Test-Path phantom_app) { Get-ChildItem -Path phantom_app -Exclude .env | Remove-Item -Recurse -Force }; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path phantom_app/system -Force; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path phantom_app/system/front -Force" && npm run build:front && npm run build:server && npm run exe && powershell -NoProfile -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse -Force dist/* phantom_app/system/front/; Copy-Item -Force launcher.html phantom_app/system/launcher.html; Copy-Item -Force PhantomTray.ps1 phantom_app/system/PhantomTray.ps1; Copy-Item -Force Run.vbs phantom_app/system/Run.vbs; Copy-Item -Force phantom_app/PhantomServer.exe phantom_app/system/PhantomServer.exe; Copy-Item -Force PhantomSetup.ps1 phantom_app/PhantomSetup.ps1; if (Test-Path phantom.ico) { Copy-Item -Force phantom.ico phantom_app/system/phantom.ico }; if (Test-Path .env.local) { Copy-Item -Force .env.local phantom_app/system/.env }; if (Test-Path phantom_app/server.js) { Remove-Item phantom_app/server.js -Force }; if (Test-Path phantom_app/PhantomServer.exe) { Remove-Item phantom_app/PhantomServer.exe -Force }; ./Build-Wrapper.ps1"
